attributes.action: Get the Mitchell's moved from their ASB nieghbours.
attributes.additional_details: My family and I have been reporting our ASB neighbours for nearly 3 years. The whole issue is based on hate crime over my Bi Polar disorder. I received countless incidents of verbal hate abuse over this. This all came to a head on the 30th 0f April 2014 my wife was finally attack by these vile people. Even though they are going through the courts, we are still being left to live directly under these people's. The stresses my family and I are under is slowly but surely breaking them apart. Please help us get moved.
